title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 1, pt. 358, subpt. 358-3 - Regulations Applying Both To Existing And New Plans
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 1, pt. 358, subpt. 358-3 - Regulations Applying Both To Existing And New Plans

State Regulations
§ 358-3.1 - Benefits "at least as favorable" construed
§ 358-3.2 - Employees not covered under a plan
§ 358-3.3 - Benefits less favorable with respect to certain employees eligible under a plan
§ 358-3.4 - Procedure for obtaining acceptance of plans under subdivisions 4 and 5 of section 211 of the workers' compensation law
§ 358-3.5 - Substitution of new carrier under a plan
§ 358-3.6 - Default in payment of assessments
§ 358-3.7 - Notices and reports required with respect to plans
§ 358-3.8 - Accepted plans
§ 358-3.9 - Review of denial of application for plan acceptance

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 1, pt. 358, subpt. 358-3

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 117, 141, 204, 211, 241

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
